channel.title: Free to play games on steam!
channel.description:
Hi guys, just though I'd share the news if you haven't seen it already, steam are officially supporting free to play games. Starting with 5 games.
Check out the article [url=https://store.steampowered.com/news/5657/]Here[/url]

item.title: Free to play games on steam!
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

^ That’s what makes it all the more fun to play these games and own the people who pay to win.

True dat, although. I’m just glad they’re on steam now, Free to play games are sometimes a lot of fun, along as they’re hand-picked by valve, wouldn’t want all of the shitty ones on there.

Read full topic
item.source: Free to play games on steam!

item.title: Free to play games on steam!
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
jerry:

Would be awesome if they would support APB

That’s not the publisher’s fault, the owners of APB at the moment made that decision themselves. Mostly because they have a deal signed with the bloatware GamersFirst.
